vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Dibon = "wasting"
This name is used for:
1) a town in Moab on the east side of the Jordan which was taken over by the Israelites and rebuilt by the children of Gad
2) a place in south Judah reinhabited by the men of Judah after the return from captivity
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad; territorio de Rubén, Moab; (b)   ciudad; territorio de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
底本 这个專有名詞 地名在希伯來文的意思是 "荒廢的"
1) 在摩押的一個市鎮, 在約旦河東方, 被以色列後裔接管並為迦得子孫所重建
2) 在猶大南方的一處, 被擄歸回後由猶大人所居住
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
底本 这个专有名词 地名在希伯来文的意思是 "荒废的"
1) 在摩押的一个市镇, 在约旦河东方, 被以色列后裔接管并为迦得子孙所重建
2) 在犹大南方的一处, 被掳归回后由犹大人所居住

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of di.von (דִּיבֹן, דִּימוֹן "Dibon" H1769)
§ Dibon = "wasting"
This name is used for:
1) a town in Moab on the east side of the Jordan which was taken over by the Israelites and rebuilt by the children of Gad
2) a place in south Judah reinhabited by the men of Judah after the return from captivity
